articles.title: Remote education is decreasing anxiety, increasing wellbeing for some students - Big Think
articles.description: A recent NIHR report found that students with previously low connectedness scores saw improvement in well-being and eased anxiety.
articles.content:

articles.title: Long-Acting Injectable Is More Effective Than Daily Pill To Prevent HIV In Women : Goats and Soda - NPR
articles.description: A single injection of a drug called cabotegravir given every two months has been shown to be more effective than a daily oral dose of Truvada.
articles.content: Pretty Mkhabela, a HIV-positive sex worker in South Africa, gets antiretroviral drugs delivered to her house as part of a campaign to maintain treatment for HIV-positive patients during the pandemic.… [+5073 chars]

articles.content:
